response.original_title: 喪服不倫 黒足袋婦人
response.overview: Today marks the thirteenth anniversary of Takashi's father's death. Even though the time for the memorial service is fast approaching, Takashi and his wife, Mio, are consumed with desire and devour each other while still wearing their mourning clothes. The memorial service was held simply at Takashi's brother's home, with only his wife, Misako, their university-aged son, Masaki, and Mio and his wife present. Mio quietly places her hands together in prayer in front of the portrait of her father-in-law, whom she has never met...
response.title: Mourning Affair: Black Tabi Lady
